text: Amparo Dols (born 25 July 1968 Valencia) is a Spanish taekwondo athlete. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics, finishing third in the Featherweight division, where taekwondo was a demonstration sport, She won a bronze medal at the 1988 European Taekwondo Championships in the â€“55 kg category. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish martial artists Category:Taekwondo practitioners
title: Amparo Dols
